channel.title: CVE Feed for Designinvento -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Designinvento -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-38755|2024-07-22T10:09:32.763Z -- designinvento -- directorypress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Designinvento DirectoryPress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects DirectoryPress: from n/a through 3.6.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-32567|2024-06-04T17:51:19.467Z -- designinvento -- directorypress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Designinvento DirectoryPress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects DirectoryPress: from n/a through 3.6.7.
